name: Judgement Panda Exfil Activity
description: Detects Judgement Panda activity as described in Global Threat Report 2019 by Crowdstrike
query: (process.command_line:/.*[Ee][Pp][Rr][Oo][Dd]\.[Ll][Dd][Ff]/ OR process.command_line:(/.*\\[Ll][Dd][Ii][Ff][Dd][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]\ \-[Ff]\ \-[Nn]\ .*/ OR /.*\\7[Zz][Aa]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]\ [Aa]\ 1\.7[Zz]\ .*/ OR /.*\\[Aa][Aa][Aa][Aa]\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Cc][Dd][Uu][Mm][Pp]64\.[Ee][Xx][Ee].*/ OR /.*\\[Aa][Aa][Aa][Aa]\\[Nn][Ee][Tt][Ss][Ee][Ss][Ss]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee].*/ OR /.*\\[Aa][Aa][Aa][Aa]\\7[Zz][Aa]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee].*/ OR /.*[Cc][Oo][Pp][Yy]\ \.\\1\.7[Zz]\ \\.*/ OR /.*[Cc][Oo][Pp][Yy]\ \\[Cc][Ll][Ii][Ee][Nn][Tt]\\[Cc]$\\[Aa][Aa][Aa][Aa]\\.*/) OR process.executable:/[Cc]\:\\[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Ss]\\[Pp][Uu][Bb][Ll][Ii][Cc]\\7[Zz][Aa]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.command_line:*eprod.ldf OR process.command_line:(*\\ldifde.exe\ \-f\ \-n\ * OR *\\7za.exe\ a\ 1.7z\ * OR *\\aaaa\\procdump64.exe* OR *\\aaaa\\netsess.exe* OR *\\aaaa\\7za.exe* OR *copy\ .\\1.7z\ \\* OR *copy\ \\client\\c$\\aaaa\\*) OR process.executable:C\:\\Users\\Public\\7za.exe)`
